name: Fix it: Gear Puzzle
description:
Fix it : Gears Puzzle is a gears puzzle game.
'Easy to play' game for all ages.

Move a given gear and connect all the stationary gears.
Use your own gear to connect all other gears from the power-connected gear.

HOW TO PLAY
• Drag and move the gear.
• Locate and connect the disconnected gear.
• No gear can be fitted to a space smaller than the size of the gear.
• Don't worry! No time limit!

FEATURES
• GEAR PUZZLE
- You can enjoy the game at any time.
- Provide addictive games with simple rules.
- Educational games.
- Smooth effect for gears puzzle game.
- Play easily and quickly.
- An engineering game based on logic.
- If you need help, please email us.

NOTES
• Fix it : Gears Puzzle contains the ads like banner, interstitial, video and house ads.
• Fix it : Gears Puzzle is free to play, but you can purchase In-app items like AD FREE and in-game currency to buy hints alike.
